headline: Is Marsh & McLennan (MMC) Pricing Reflect Its Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Marsh & McLennan Companies at around US$185 per share is offering fair value or a potential mismatch between price and worth, you are not alone. The stock has had mixed returns, with a 1% decline over the last 7 days, a 2% gain over the last 30 days, a 1.7% gain year to date, and a 10.2% decline over the past year, against longer term returns of 13.9% over 3 years and 76.8% over 5 years. Recent attention on Marsh & McLennan has focused on how a global insurance...
